div.p: The Medication Prescription document describes the content and format of a Prescription document generated during the process in which a health care professional decides that the patient needs medication (ONE or MORE).

This exchange format is defined as a document type that corresponds to a Bundle as a FHIR resource. A Bundle has alist of entries. The first entry is the Composition, in which all contained entries are then referenced.
